misdeed: Hunters and villagers in the forest near Svart√• have been going missing, and some who return speak of a woman leading them astray.
solution: The Vaesen is a wood wife. She can be banished by burning or cutting down the heart trees of the forest.

clues.description: Hunters report seeing a beautiful woman with antlers in the forest.
People who return from the forest are often disoriented and speak of being led astray.
Strange animal behavior, with wolves and deer acting unusually tame or aggressive.
A villager's child went missing and was found days later, unharmed but speaking of a lady in the trees.
Marks of claws and antlers are found on trees in the forest.
An old tale from the village speaks of a forest spirit that punishes those who harm the woods.
Strange patterns of moss and leaves are found arranged in circles and symbols.

plotTwist.description: A local charcoal burner has fallen in love with the wood wife and is helping her lure people into the forest.
